page.title: 04EGLOS FARM, GULVAL
page.content: Eglos Farm is typical of farms in the area. Mr.Wallis the farmer told us that this season he grew 30 acres of broccoli, 8 acres of cabbages, and 2 acres of corn. Altogether his farm covers{76 acres.}He grows 6 kinds of {crops}- broccoli, cabbage, potatoes, hay, silage, anemones and grass. The best crop he grows on his farm is broccoli. For{cattle}he keeps 25 Hereford Crosses but no other kind except beef cattle. The{machinery}he uses includes harrows, tractors, rollers, trailers, ploughs, bailers e.t.c. He uses both artificial fertilisers and farmyard manure. He has a very small patch of woodland on his farm.
